name: Newman and Company
overview:
We have the best apartments that Boston has to offer. If you are looking for an apartment in Boston or in the surrounding Boston area, we have the highest quality selection of apartment rentals available in all of Boston’s historic neighborhoods. We feature apartments in Back Bay, Beacon Hill, the North End, the South End, Brighton, Allston, Brookline, Cambridge, South Boston, Somerville, and more!

We specialize in Boston apartment rentals, and we the best that Boston has to offer. We are centrally located on Newbury Street, in the heart of Back Bay, and we are open seven days a week for your convenience.

Here at Newman & Company, we understand that everybody has different objectives when searching for an apartment in Boston. We feature all kinds of apartments from a cozy studio to a classic brownstone, and our professional staff aims to achieve optimal results for each client. You can turn to us for your Boston real estate needs!
